name: Around the World in 80 Days
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Advance (EU) (from Ad Blurbs)

Play the role of Passepartout (Jackie Chan) and travel with Phileas Fogg around the world in 80 days.

Face a variety of astonishing adventures and escapades!
  • Use a variety of kicks and punches to dispatch your enemies with signature Jackie Chan flair!
  • Visit exotic locations across the world such as China, India, Turkey and many others!
  • Travel in a variety of unique methods such as train, elephant, ship, airplane, and balloon.
  • A storyline with various twists, suspense, and comedy.

releases.country: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Luxembourg, The Netherlands, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
